description:
ASCENT v1.3.1 Release Notes

v1.3.0 -> v1.3.1: new features

moved FiberZMode from model.json into sim.json
added "EXPLICIT" FiberZMode to model explicitly provided 3D fiber coordinates
added "EXPLICIT_3D" FiberXYMode to pair with the explicit FiberZMode when modeling explicit 3D fiber coordinates
added 3D plotting function to visualize 3D fibers within fascicles/nerve
added pop-up plots for when invalid fibers are detected
v1.3.0 -> v1.3.1: docs

added documentation for the new JSON configuration properties used for modeling user-defined 3D explicit fibers and included explicit_3D template example file
added DOI information for new papers using ASCENT
added cuff parameter descriptions to the ImThera_flip_100.json cuff preset
added documentation for implementations of clinically used cuff electrodes (Cuff Sources)
updated documentation for dataset generation tool
v1.3.0 -> v1.3.1: bug fixes

fixed error when importing from ascent's classes in analysis scripts by adding root directory to sys.path
fixed error when unpacking a sim object's potentials_product attribute that does not contain any active recording cuffs
v1.3.0 -> v1.3.1: miscellaneous

upgraded to Python 3.10 for windows install
added nd_line python package to required package dependencies in requirements.txt
notes: Research supported by the National Institutes of Health SPARC Program (OT2 OD025340)
